_header: Gods grace is ready both early and late
Subjects: advice, moral; advice, spiritual; debates; grace
_description: The debate between nurture and kind — 68 lines in 8-line stanzas

BLHar541.First Lines:
Goddis grace is redy bothe erly & lateA vertuys ma more may oft
                    fynd…
BLHar541.Last Lines:
…But nedis þai must togidr yn fayBe closed yn on kynd and
                    nurtur
BLHar541.Editions:
Scattergood,  V. John. 
             “‘The Debate between Nurture and Kynd’—An Unpublished
                Middle English Poem.” 
             Notes and Queries
         n.s. 17 [215] (1970): 244-6: 254-6.
Conlee,  John W.,
                        ed.  
             Middle English Debate Poetry: A Critical Anthology.
         East Lansing, MI: Colleagues Press, 1991: 217-21.
